qas.question: Who was responsible for constructing the Jantar Mantar?

answers.text: Maharaja Jai Singh II of Jaipur

qas.question: In what area of New Delhi is the Jantar Mantar observatory located?
The Jantar Mantar consists of how many architectural astronomy instruments?
What is one of the primary purposes of the Jantar Mantar observatory?
What is the name of the observatory built in Connaught Place by Maharaja Jai Singh II of Jaipur?

context: <a4_0>Jantar Mantar<a4_0/> located in <a1_0>Connaught Place<a1_0/> was built by <a0_0>Maharaja Jai Singh II of Jaipur<a0_0/>. It consists of <a2_0>13<a2_0/> architectural astronomy instruments. The primary purpose of the observatory was to <a3_0>compile astronomical tables<a3_0/>, and to predict the times and movements of the sun, moon and planets.
